text: Kazhutʹ, "Khto zaboronyv krasyvoho BOHA rechey utvoryv dlya Yoho stvorinʹ, ta harnykh umov?" Skazhitʹ, "Taki umovy musyatʹ buty otrymani nasolodu vid u tsʹomu zhytti tsymy khto vvazhayutʹ. Bilʹshe toho, harni umovy budutʹ vyklyuchno yikhni na Dni Resurrection." My takym chynom roz'yasnyuyemo apokalipsys dlya lyudey shcho znayutʹ
